nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor. Must send the amount at stake when creating the contract. Note that the move and salt must be saved.
 @param _c1Hash Must be equal to keccak256(c1,salt) where c1 is the move of the j1.
nodes.name: RPS

nodes.documentation:
@dev To be called by j2 and provided stake.
 @param _c2 The move submitted by j2.
nodes.name: play
solve

nodes.documentation: @dev Let j2 get the funds back if j1 did not play.
nodes.name: j1Timeout

nodes.documentation: @dev Let j1 take back the funds if j2 never play.
nodes.name: j2Timeout
win

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor. Must send the amount at stake when creating the contract. Note that the move and salt must be saved.
 @param _c1Hash Must be equal to keccak256(c1,salt) where c1 is the move of the j1.

attributes.documentation:
@dev To be called by j2 and provided stake.
 @param _c2 The move submitted by j2.
attributes.name: play
solve

attributes.documentation: @dev Let j2 get the funds back if j1 did not play.
attributes.name: j1Timeout

attributes.documentation: @dev Let j1 take back the funds if j2 never play.
attributes.name: j2Timeout
win

j1Timeout().details: Let j2 get the funds back if j1 did not play.

j2Timeout().details: Let j1 take back the funds if j2 never play.

play(uint8).details: To be called by j2 and provided stake.

solve(uint8,uint256).details: To be called by j1. Reveal the move and send the ETH to the winning party or split them.

params._salt: The salt used when submitting the commitment when the constructor was called.

win(uint8,uint8).details: Is this move winning over the other.

params._c2: The move the first move is considered again.

win(uint8,uint8).return: w True if c1 beats c2. False if c1 is beaten by c2 or in case of tie.
